job.title: Software Development Engineer, Test - HelloSign (Location Flexible)
job.description: ltstronggtcompany descriptionltstronggtltbrgt ltpgtdropbox is a leading global collaboration platform thats transforming the way people work together from the smallest business to the largest enterprise with more than million registered users across more than countries our mission is to design a more enlightened way of working from our headquarters in san francisco to eight dedicated studios and a worldwide team of employees who choose where they work best our virtual first approach is leading the way into the future of workltpgtltbrgt ltstronggtteam descriptionltstronggtltbrgt ltpgtour engineering team is working to simplify the way people work together theyre building a family of products that handle over a billion files a day for people around the world with our broad mission and massive scale there are countless opportunities to make an impactltpgtltbrgt ltstronggtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltstronggtrole descriptionltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltbrgtltpgtif you are someone who thrives on innovation thinking creatively and have a passion for creating something your users love we invite you to check out hellosign our customer base of and growing businesses already love us and now were thinking even bigger in our push towards the enterprise were looking for skilled and motivated engineers to join our expanding team at hellosign we build our products with performance scale and security in mind in addition to being highly skilled on the technical side you should also be able to put yourself in the users shoes and think critically about how your work will improve their experience we take pride in our work and want you to as wellltpgtltbrgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltbrgtltulgtltligtassist with building a qualitydriven engineering culture with the objective of shipping hellosign features rapidly and with good confidence to our customersltligtltligtown the endtoend test strategy for automated and manual testing of hellosigns developer experienceltligtltligthelp tackle crossteam engineering challenges and contribute creative ideas to improve qualityltligtltulgtltbrgtltstronggtrequirementsltstronggtltbrgtltulgtltligt years of experience in quality engineering for a webbased productltligtltligtproficiency with at least one programing languageltligtltligtexperience with test automation tools such as selenium webdriverltligtltligtfamiliar with web technologies php python javascript html json etcltligtltligtfundamentals of object oriented principlesltligtltulgtltbrgtltbrgt ltpgtdropbox is an equal opportunity employer we are a welcoming place for everyone and we do our best to make sure all people feel supported and connected at work a big part of that effort is our support for members and allies of internal groups like asians at dropbox blackdropboxers latinx pridebox lgbtq vets at dropbox women at dropbox atx diversity based in austin texas and the dropbox empowerment network based in dublin irelandltpgt
